layman_description: Chemical accelerant that speeds up smelting and crafting processes.
technical_description: Consumable with craft speed multiplier and resource yield bonus.
player_impact: Forge items much faster using less fuel and resources.

layman_description: Advanced compound that doubles output on crafting operations.
technical_description: Premium consumable with crafting output doubling and enhancement bonus.
player_impact: Craft twice as many items from same resources.

layman_description: Specialized equipment that extracts more materials from gathered resources.
technical_description: Tool with resource yield multiplication and harvest efficiency factor.
player_impact: Gathering gives significantly more of each resource type.

layman_description: Device that speeds mineral smelting without consuming extra fuel.
technical_description: Equipment with smelting speed and thermal efficiency bonus.
player_impact: Smelt ores and metals much faster at furnaces.

layman_description: Substance applied to crafting improving final item quality significantly.
technical_description: Crafting additive with quality scaling and tier increase chance.
player_impact: Crafted items have higher quality and better performance.

layman_description: Potion that multiplies experience gained from all activities.
technical_description: Consumable buff with experience multiplier and skill advancement bonus.
player_impact: Level up skills and perks much faster in all areas.

layman_description: Pharmaceutical that makes you detect loot and resources more easily.
technical_description: Consumable with detection radius extension and item visibility boost.
player_impact: See loot highlighted in buildings from much further away.

layman_description: Enhanced compass that shows nearby points of interest on map.
technical_description: Equipment with map reveal and waypoint auto-detection.
player_impact: Automatically discover and map important locations nearby.

layman_description: Tech equipment that warns you of upcoming weather hazards in advance.
technical_description: Equipment with weather forecast and advance notification system.
player_impact: Get early warning of blood moons and severe weather.

layman_description: Device that speeds up local time flow for rapid gameplay.
technical_description: Equipment with time dilation and simulation speed increase.
player_impact: Time passes faster letting you get through nights quickly.

layman_description: Specialized bed that grants buff bonuses from sleeping.
technical_description: Furniture with regeneration boost and buff duration extension.
player_impact: Wake up with beneficial effects improving all performance.

layman_description: Storage container that prevents food from rotting in inventory.
technical_description: Equipment with spoilage prevention and shelf-life extension.
player_impact: Food lasts indefinitely without needing constant replacement.

layman_description: Single-use purifier that makes any water safe to drink.
technical_description: Consumable with contamination removal and hydration restoration.
player_impact: Drink any water source without taking poison damage.

layman_description: Supplement that multiplies hunger satisfaction from all meals.
technical_description: Consumable with hunger efficiency and fullness duration bonus.
player_impact: Stay fed longer eating smaller portions of food.

layman_description: Energy drink that immediately restores all stamina reserves.
technical_description: Consumable with stamina restoration and recovery rate boost.
player_impact: Instantly regain stamina to keep running and fighting.

layman_description: Chemical that keeps you alert preventing sleepiness effects.
technical_description: Consumable with fatigue resistance and consciousness duration.
player_impact: Stay awake and alert indefinitely without sleeping.

layman_description: Painkiller that reduces damage taken from physical injuries.
technical_description: Consumable with damage reduction percentage and resistance stacking.
player_impact: Take significantly less damage from all sources temporarily.

layman_description: Medical treatment that neutralizes all types of poison and toxins.
technical_description: Consumable with toxin removal and poison immunity duration.
player_impact: Cure any poison or toxic damage instantly.

layman_description: Treatment that removes all radioactive contamination from body.
technical_description: Consumable with radiation removal and contamination immunity.
player_impact: Cure radiation sickness and prevent radiation damage.

layman_description: Vaccine that protects against all infections and diseases.
technical_description: Preventative consumable with disease immunity and infection blocking.
player_impact: Cannot get infected or diseased by any source.
